title: Cloud Architect
description: CloudDesign is seeking a Cloud Architect to design scalable cloud solutions. You'll lead cloud migration efforts and implement best practices for cloud infrastructure.
responsibilities: Design and implement cloud architect solutions that meet business requirements
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products
Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices
Contribute to documentation and knowledge sharing
requirements: 5+ years of experience in cloud architect or similar role
Strong knowledge of AWS, Azure, GCP
Experience with Cloud Migration and Microservices
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (or equivalent experience)
nice_to_have: Previous experience in a similar industry
education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience
